product_name: Saucony Kinvara TR 2 Trail-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: With highly breathable uppers and a minimalist, lightweight design, the men's Saucony Kinvara TR 2 trail-running shoes outfit your feet for high-octane trail runs. 4mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a midfoot/forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. Ultralight, breathable uppers feature thin nylon mesh and bonded thermoplastic urethane overlays that supply structure and support throughout the gait cycle. Nylon linings wick moisture away to keep your feet cool. Memory foam provides heel cushioning; upgraded rock plate is made of nylon fiber mesh for lightweight yet reliable protection. Lightweight EVA midsoles enhance energy response; outsoles on the Saucony Kinvara TR 2 feature multidirectional lugging for excellent grip on the trails.
short_description: With highly breathable uppers and a minimalist, lightweight design, the men's Saucony Kinvara TR 2 trail-running shoes outfit your feet for high-octane trail runs.
